ygData.subject: Re: Evil Characters
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 34 you can go to East Karana and kill human guards or you can go to butcher and kill the dwarve chicks there. However you have to have jboots to do
ygData.messageBody:
At level 34 you can go to East Karana and kill human guards or you can go to butcher and kill the dwarve chicks there. However you have to have jboots to do this.

Naeeldar
-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ_Shaman@onelist.com <EQ_Shaman@onelist.com>; EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 20, 1999 9:26 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Evil Characters


Does anyone know of a good web site that talks about what "GOOD" guards you can kill and the levels they are? I have a Necromancer and an Ogre Shaman both of which don't mind killing Good Guards . . . I just wanted to get an idea of where I can go to kill GOOD NPCs and at what lvl . . .

thanks

P.S. If you don't know a web site maybe you can post a mini-guide for killing guards. Thanks

Fraal Bloodreaver the Ogre Shaman
Skel Lifebane the Necromancer
E'ci
